name: Falling Coins
description:
Rig pachinko games to rob the casino! Activate and deactivate pegs to influence the direction of the ball and make hundreds. Just watch out though, the parlor might be catching on...

Made for the MST Fall Jam 2021 (Donny#0100 in the discord)

This is my first game let me know what you think!

Sound effects taken from freesound.org

https://freesound.org/people/vlammenos/sounds/52906/
